  • Uses of Credentials in com.glyart.mystral.database

    Methods in com.glyart.mystral.database that return Credentials
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Credentials
    Credentials.CredentialsBuilder.build()
    Builds a Credentials object, ready to be passed to Mystral.newDatabase(Credentials).
    If you want async usage you may need Mystral.newAsyncDatabase(Credentials, Executor).
    Methods in com.glyart.mystral.database with parameters of type Credentials
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static @NotNull AsyncDatabase
    Mystral.newAsyncDatabase​(@NotNull Credentials credentials, @NotNull Executor executor)
    Creates a new AsyncDatabase with the given Credentials and an Executor implementation.
    static @NotNull Database
    Mystral.newDatabase​(@NotNull Credentials credentials)
    Creates a new Database with the given Credentials.
